summary: Complete overhaul of the Heavy armor tree in skyrim requiem. integrates a new progressive perk style and a completely revamped battlemage style. perks are for the player only at the moment, no original requiem perk are edited thus npc's will have no changes. heavy armor has all new perks and the magic mastery perks have new player only effects.
descriptionHtml:
When I first played with requiem I felt like I was on an alien planet. The people were the same but somehow it all was different. I had to explore and die, and die again in order to familiarize myself with this new  world. Just when I thought that I knew it all requiem would surprise me. This happened less and less over time until eventually I actually almost know everything. After diving into the ck and finishing the perk analysis (a list of every perks effects that is posted on the r/skyrimrequiem subreddit), I could say that I know every perk and all it’s effects. I fully lost that sense of wonder, of unknown and that’s where this project comes along. I want to turn the perks into unknown territory. To open doors that weren’t open before. I want you to play how you want not a predetermined class. For veterans of requiem who have surmounted the toughest odds, there's more to come. Assassin poison your blades, mages collect your scrolls and warriors throw on that steel plate, for this is requiem second wind.

The goal of this project is to completely revitalize requiems perk system. Through new branches/perks, new mechanics and updated perks hoepfully i hope to create a perk system that encompasses more playstyles and really sheds uniqueness in each one.

Heavy Armor-
author: MrCooney
